full_text:
Epstein #76318-054
From (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
To (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Date 2019/08/28 09:55
Subject: Epstein #76318-054
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Hi (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
I just had a nice chat with (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) from the Florida Sheriff's Office. He was very cooperative and agreed to send us Epstein's PSR and/or any documents that have PSR-like information. He said a lot of the Epstein files were destroyed per their RIDS before Epstein was even arrested here, but he is going to do through whatever documents they have for me. (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) said it would take about a week for him to pull the relevant documents. Once he gathered the documents, he said he would send them to me rather than email them. Apparently Florida has a very open FOIA law and all of his emails are subject to public disclosure (which sounds like a nightmare!). He said he would burn the documents onto a CD and FedEx it to me (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) . I'll be out of the office next week, but he has (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) number. (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) said he would call (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) and give him a heads-up that the mail was forthcoming.
Feel free to give me a ring if you want to discuss further.
Thank you!
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, NY 10007
p: 646-836-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
f: 646-836-7665

additional_notes: The document contains multiple redactions, indicated by (b)(6); (b)(7)(C), which suggests that sensitive information has been withheld.
